title: Relates to increasing the maximum sales tax rate for cities and counties; repealer
summary: Relates to increasing the maximum sales tax rate for cities and counties to four percent; repeals all additional local percentage increases.

       AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the maximum sales
         tax rate for cities and counties and to repeal certain  provisions  of
         such law relating thereto

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    7  within  a  city,  acting  through  its local legislative body, is hereby
    8  authorized and empowered to adopt and amend local  laws,  ordinances  or
    9  resolutions  imposing in any such city or county the following taxes, at
   10  the rate of one-half, one, one and one-half, two, two and one-half [or],
